title: Ibn Battutas travel journal - claim support

content.question: Which of the following claims about the Swahili Coast could best be supported by Ibn Battuta's description?

choices.label: Trade was an important part of the economy.
A Mediterranean climate was widespread in the region.
Christianity had a significant impact on the culture.
Timbuktu unified the region under one government.

content.answer: Trade was an important part of the economy.

topic.text: 1.8: Culture and Trade in Southern and East Africa
